Articles.Content:
Hope you like it. Let me know what you think.

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/DHgre07TXEI?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

> 
> Hope you like it. Let me know what you think.
> 
> 
> 
> <iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/DHgre07TXEI?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

Any chance of a download link:P ? looks nice from what i can see ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) Cant watch the video, over my download limit.

Btw whats the load capacity?
Honestly I've not tested the max load capacity so I'm not sure. I'm going to be using this main for small satellites and probes since the mk2 bay is fairly small. I'll try and upload to Kerbal X

> 
> Any chance of a download link:P ? looks nice from what i can see ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) Cant watch the video, over my download limit.
> Btw whats the load capacity?

[http://kerbalx.com/cattasraafe/Bee-Line-MKI](http://kerbalx.com/cattasraafe/Bee-Line-MKI) Here is the Kerbal X link let me know how ya like the craft. Also tell me how much you carry in it since I have not tested that yet.

> 
> [http://kerbalx.com/cattasraafe/Bee-Line-MKI](http://kerbalx.com/cattasraafe/Bee-Line-MKI) Here is the Kerbal X link let me know how ya like the craft. Also tell me how much you carry in it since I have not tested that yet.

Awesome ill download it now and have a crack

That's a very respectable on-air speed for a nuStock ascent, nice job ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

What sort of cargo mass can you carry? Looks like you have ample thrust and a bit of spare delta-v for something moderately hefty...

Looks nice. I can never get something like that into orbit

 ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)
